item.title: R and Python with Some Pandas
item.description: Do You Mean Real Pandas? Unfortunatly no, but that would make R and Python exponentially cooler. Showing off using R and Python Together library(reticulate) What is Pandas? import pandas as pd quakes=pd.read_csv("https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/csv/datasets/quakes.csv",index_col=0) print(quakes[:10]) ## lat long depth mag stations ## 1 -20.42 181.62 562 4.8 41 ## 2 -20.62 181.03 650 4.2 15 ## 3 -26.00 184.10 42 5.4 43 ## 4 -17.97 181.66 626 4.1 19 ## 5 -20.
